title: Brandão (Pedro de Lima)
body: He was appointed to serve as Governor and Captain General of Madeira on May 29, 1683, and took office on April 18, 1684.

Pedro de Lima Brandão: Governor and Captain General of Madeira

1683: Appointment of Pedro de Lima Brandão as Governor and Captain General of Madeira
1684: Assumption of office by Pedro de Lima Brandão as Governor and Captain General of Madeira
